schema:creator: Barnett, Eva
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ This is a picture of the chalk mural that I did on the sidewalk leading to the community green belt outside my house. When my neighbor posted on social media that she appreciated the artwork it made me feel special. Art has let me remain connected to my community and helped me get through isolation. I want to thank the City of Davis for putting on this art contest and bringing people together. Special thanks to Yvette Garcia  
 __Participant age:__ 11  
 __Category:__  Kids Age 9-11 (drawings/paintings only)
schema:name: Spread Hope
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
